articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine: How common are blood clots and should I be worried? - CNN
articles.description: Following weeks of speculation about whether Oxford-AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine might be connected to dozens of cases of blood clots reported in the region, European drug regulators have now announced that they have indeed established a link.
articles.content:

articles.title: FDA stops use of AstraZeneca – The Manila Times - The Manila Times
articles.description: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has advised the Department of Health (DoH) to stop giving the AZD1222 vaccine of British-Swedish drugmaker AstraZeneca to persons below 60 years old. The recommendation comes after the European Medicines Agency (EMA) ann…

articles.author: Ian Curran
articles.title: Minimum wage workers disproportionately affected by pandemic disruption, says ESRI - thejournal.ie
articles.description: With cost of living taken into account, Ireland has just the seventh-highest minimum wage in Europe.

articles.title: From California to Brazil: Europe's privacy laws have created a recipe for the world - CNBC
articles.description: As Europe's sweeping GDPR laws approach their third anniversary, other jurisdictions around the world are taking cues from it to develop their own frameworks.
